description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Lamb Skewers & Zesty Yoghurt Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Marinated Lamb Skewers & Zesty Yoghurt Sauce
name: Marinated Lamb Skewers & Zesty Yoghurt Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill on high. Thread lamb onto prepared skewers alternately with capsicum and onion. Drizzle with oil. Cook for 5 minutes, turning, until golden and cooked to your liking. Transfer to a platter. Make Greek salad according to packet instructions. Serve skewers with remaining yoghurt sauce and salad.

Transfer to a platter. Make Greek salad according to packet instructions. Serve skewers with remaining yoghurt sauce and salad.
